name: The Mughals Quiz / Test | Royalty & Monarchs | 10 Questions

questions.text: Babur was the first of the Mughal Emperors.
questions.explanation:
true.

	After Babur came Humayun, then Akbar, then Jahangir, then Shah Jahan, then Aurangzeb and lastly Badur Shah Zafar.

questions.text: To whom did Humayun lose the throne?
questions.explanation:
Sher Shah Suri.

	Humayun and his family were homeless wanderers. But then, on realizing Sher Shah Suri was weak, they fought and Humayun regained the throne. Humayun died soon later leaving his only son, Akbar, who became Emperor at the age of only 13.

questions.text: Between 1556 snd 1560 which places did Akbar conquer?
questions.explanation:
Gwalior, Jaipur and Ajmer.

	Punjab, Gujurat and Goa were not conqered between 1556 to 1560. Gwalior, Jaipur and Ajmer were big and would bring wealth to the kingdom.

questions.text: After Akbar's father, Humayun's death, who became his guardian?
questions.explanation:
Bairam Khan.

	Akbar wanted to rule on his own for a while so he sent Bairam Khan (his uncle) on a trip to Mecca. But on his way, Bairam was killed by rivals.

Salim.

	He succeded Akbar to the throne after killing his brothers.

questions.text: What is Noor Jahan's father's name?
questions.explanation:
Mirza Ghiyas Beg.

	He was a Persian adventurer. Noor Jahan was the wife of Jahangir. She was like Akbar's courtier, Birbal. With her father, she was brought to court, and Jahangir married her.

questions.text: What is Noor Jahan's real name?
questions.explanation:
Mihr-un-nisa.

	Mihr-un-nisa's name changed to Noor Jahan after her marriage to Jahangir. SHe was fond of Persian literature.

questions.text: In Shah Jahan's reign, what was Old Delhi called?
questions.explanation:
Shahjahanabad.

	Shahjahanabad is now Old Delhi. Shah Jahan had a daughter called Jahanara.  Aurangzeb imprisoned his father in a prison across the river Yamuna. Shah Jahan was nursed by his daughter, Jahanara.

questions.text: Was Shah Jahan the last Mughal Emperor?
questions.explanation:
No.

	The last Mughal Emperor was Badusha, who suceeded Aurangzeb, Shah Jahan's son.

questions.text: What is the first name of the last Mughal emperor?
questions.explanation:
Bhadur.

	Bhadur Shah Jafar was very weak.
